title: United Arab Emirates
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 512 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 610L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     U
description: Explore this fascinating Middle Eastern country with your students as they learn about United Arab Emirates' people, land, history, and significant landmarks.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
